problem_text_cn: 如图所示,直线CD与以线段AB为直径的圆相切于点D并交BA的延长线于点C,且AB=2,AD=1,P点在切线CD的延长线上移动时,则△PBD的外接圆的半径的最小值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the straight line CD is tangent to the circle with the line segment AB as the diameter at point D and intersects the extended line of BA at point C, and AB = N_0, AD = N_1, when point P moves on the extended line of the tangent line CD , Then the minimum radius of the circumscribed circle of △PBD is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接DO．∵AB是直径,∴∠ADB=90°,∵AB=2,AD=1,∴AB=2AD,∴∠ABD=30°,∵OD=OB,∴∠ODB=∠OBD=30°,∵CD是切线,∴∠PDO=90°,∴∠PDB=60°,由题意当BD为△PBD外接圆直径时,△PBD的外接圆半径最小．∵BD=√{AB^{2}-AD^{2}}=√{3},∴△PBD外接圆的半径为\frac{√{3}}{2}．故选:B．
raw_formal_point: 三角形的外接圆与外心
raw_comment: 本题考查切线的性质、三角形外接圆的性质等知识,解题的关键是判断BD是△PBD外接圆的直径时,△PBD外接圆半径最小．
